FAQTalk To Us
Click on the Buy Airtime Menu
Select “TOP-UP YOUR PHONE” for Self Recharge or “TOP-UP OTHER PHONES” for Third Party Recharge and complete the fields by selecting the desired airtime amount and network.
Insert Card Details, i.e. Card number, Expiry Date, CVV, PIN, Safetoken/OTP, or Verve eCash PIN if you are using eCash
documents.question: How do I buy Airtime via Quickteller

documents.text:
Click on the Transfer Money menu
Complete the fields by inserting the account number, desired bank name and amount
Insert Card Details, i.e. PAN, Expiry Date, CVV, PIN, Safetoken/OTP or Verve eCash PIN if you are transferring from your eCash account.
documents.question: How do I Transfer Money via Quickteller

documents.text:
Click on the Pay Bills menu
Search for the biller or go to the billers category and select the biller
Insert the customer ID
Insert Card Details, i.e. Card number, Expiry Date, CVV, PIN, Safetoken/OTP, or Verve eCash PIN if you are using eCash
documents.question: How do I Pay Bills via Quickteller

documents.text: Verve cards and Naira MasterCard are currently accepted for all transaction types. VISA cards are also supported for airtime and bill payments on the website.
documents.question: What types of cards can I use to make payment on QuickTeller?

documents.text:
To add a card via the website;
Click on "Card" under Payment Methods from the Quickteller dashboard
Click on Add card
Enter your card details and complete the steps to add your card
To add a card via the mobile app;
Tap on "My Wallet" from the "Sidebar Menu"
Tap on "Add a New Card"
Enter your card details and complete the steps to add your card
To add a card while carrying out a transaction;
Click on the service you would like to pay for
Enter your new card details
Click on the "Add card to Wallet" button
Complete your payment. Your new card can be viewed in the cards module
documents.question: How do I add my card on Quickteller

documents.text:
To delete a card via the mobile app;
Tap on "My Wallet" from the "Sidebar Menu"
Tap on an existing card
Select "Delete Card" to successfully delete your card
documents.question: How do I delete my card on Quickteller?

documents.text:
Buy airtime – All at face value. No additional charges.
Pay bill – A N100 convenience fee is charged for each successful transaction
Send Money – Up-to N52.50 convenience fee is charged for each successful transaction,
Receive Money– At no cost to the recipient.
Prepaid Card Funding – All at face value. No additional charges.
documents.question: Are there any fees for this service, monthly charges or annual fees?

documents.text: The Interswitch payment gateway minimum amount is N50 and no maximum amount is defined by the payment gate. The maximum amount for recharge is N20,000 while bill payment and transfers is defined by your bank and can be adjusted by visiting you bank.
documents.question: Are there minimum or maximum amounts that can be paid?

documents.text: Contact [email protected] with your payment reference.
documents.question: I made a successful payment but I am yet to receive service as expected

documents.text: Your bank should reverse the transaction within 24 hours. If the funds are yet to be reversed into your account or card you may contact [email protected] or call +2347009065000
documents.question: I made a payment that was not successful but I have been debited

documents.text: We have made the dashboard easy for you to transact quickly. You can check the balance of your ecash in one view, view saved payments and the number of transactions per payment types. You can view the transaction history for the month.
documents.question: How do I use the Dashboard?

documents.text: One-Time Password, and is used to authenticate a card-not-present transaction (Verve card or MasterCard).
documents.question: What is the meaning of Safetoken/OTP?

documents.text: OTP can be delivered via the following channels: SMS and email. If you experience a delay in receiving your OTP, you can request for the OTP to be delivered via WhatsApp.
documents.question: What channels are available for delivering OTP?

documents.text:
Add our official WhatsApp number 07009065000 to your contacts and initiate a chat to request for the OTP. 07009065000 is the only WhatsApp number we use for OTP requests, and we will never request for your personal information.
Make a request to receive the OTP on the chat using the mobile number linked to your account on the Platform.
Follow the prompts to receive the OTP.
documents.question: How can I request for my OTP to be sent via WhatApp?

documents.text:
Yes, however for self-recharge transactions, SafeToken/OTP is not required.
NOTE: For GTB and Zenith Bank cardholders, use OTP device provided by the bank.
documents.question: Must I always enter Safetoken/OTP?

documents.text:
Kindly follow the steps below to get your card registered for the OTP service.
Visit an ATM
Insert your card
Select Quickteller
Select "Pay bills"
Choose your account type
Select “Others”
Enter 322222 as the payment code
Enter your phone number as “Customer Reference”
Accept the N1.00 amount displayed
Follow prompts to complete the activation
documents.question: How do I register for a safetoken/OTP?

documents.text:
To request for a loan via the website
Click here
Enter requested loan amount, account number to receive the loan as well as bank name
Proceed to select the preferred loan provider and accept the loan offer.
To request for a loan using Short Code
Dial *723#
Select 'Get Loan'
Follow prompt to get your loan disbursed
How do I request for a loan extension? (Migo Only)
To request a loan extension, simply dial *561# from your registered number
Select 'loans'
Select 'extend Loan'
documents.question: How do I request for a Loan

documents.text:
How do I repay online
Go to www.quickteller.com/ils and select the lender you have a loan with
Enter your phone number you used to apply and enter your email.
Confirm amount to pay.
Enter card details and complete repayment
How do I repay using the ATM
Insert your ATM card and select the 'Quickteller' option
Select 'Pay Bills'
Select 'Others'
Enter Biller/Payment Code e.g. 04309403(Migo) or 04309401(Ferratum) or 04309407(Xtracash) or 04309411(Quickloan (Payzfast)) or 04309408(Instantcash) or 04309406(Lendaba) or 053389801(QuickFund) or 0439773977(Lendme) or  053389601(Creditdirect) or  04396902(Moninow)
For the Customer Reference Number, enter the phone number used to request the loan
Confirm payment
How do I repay using Short code (USSD)
Dial *723#
Select 'Pay Bills'
Select 'Others'
Enter your Loan Biller name Migo, Ferratum, Xtracash, Quickloan (Payzfast), Instantcash, Lendaba, Lendme, QuickFund, Creditdirect, Moninow.
For the Customer Reference Number, enter the phone number used to request the loan
Enter amount
Select a card and enter card details
Confirm payment
How do I repay at the Bank
Walk into any of these banks listed: Fidelity, Access, UBA, Keystone, Sterling, GT bank, Wema, Unity or Polaris
Inform the bank you want to pay your loan on PAYDIRECT and give them your loan phone number as customer reference number.
How do I repay at a Quickteller paypoint agent kiosk or shop
Walk into a Quickteler Paypoint agent's location near you and request to repay your loan.
You will be asked to provide your phone number and cash for repayment.
How do I pay with my ewallet
Log into your Quickteller account.
Search for the lender you have a loan with on the search bar.
Enter your phone number used to apply for the loan, click on continue.
On the card page, select your ewallet card as a repayment option and proceed to make payment
How to use pay with transfer method
Click on the unique lenders link (https://www.quickteller.com/lender/xxxxxxxx)
Select Repay loan.
Select the pay now button
Select Repay Loan with Bank Transfer and an Account number will be specifically generated for the customer.
Initiate a transfer using the account number generated for you.
documents.question: How do I pay back my Loan

documents.text:
To request for a loan via the mobile app;
Tap on "Loan" from either the "Menu sidebar" or "Quick Services"
Tap on "Request Loan"
Proceed to select the preferred loan provider and accept the loan offer.
Select your preferred card or enter a new card where your loan will be credited to
documents.question: How can I request for a loan on my Quickteller mobile app?

documents.text:
To repay your loan via the mobile app;
Login to your Quickteller mobile ap
Tap on the loan you want to pay back under "Active" Loan history
Confirm amount to pay.
Enter card details and complete repayment
documents.question: How do I repay my loan using my mobile app?

documents.text: Check the status of your transaction for your token by clicking on "check status" on your dashboard. Or you can contact us at [email protected]
documents.question: I paid my electricity bill but i am yet to receive my recharge pin/token

documents.text:
Recharge
*723*[Amount]#
*723*[MobileNumber]*[Amount]#
This is a short code for a self-recharge transaction.
Use this code to recharge other people’s phone number.
Balance enquiry
*723*00#
You can use this code to check your account balance. This includes eCash account balance and your other bank accounts. Please note, extra cost may apply and your card must have been added on Quickteller.
Transfer
*723*[AccountNumber]*[Amount]#
Use this code to transfer funds to a bank account.
Generate OTP
*723*0#
Use this code to generate OTP to complete your transaction.
Opt out of OTP
*723*0000#
Use this code to opt out of using Quickteller USSD service.
Bill Payment
*723*[PaymentCode]*[CustomerId]*[Amount]#
*723*[PaymentCode]*[Amount]#
Use this code to pay bills on Quickteller USSD service.
Loans
*723*6#
Access Quickteller loans from USSD service.
Pin Selection
*723*3#
*723*4#
Use this code to select a new PIN when you have not activated your eCash.
Use this code to change existing eCash PIN.
Generate Paycode for Withdrawal
*723*8*Amount#
Use this code to generate a Paycode of an amount between N1,000 and N20,000 in multiples of N1,000 and cash out at any Paycode Accepting ATM.

documents.text:
The New quick teller offers:
Better experience with our new and intuitive UI
The new Quickteller Account for faster transactions
Multiple payments and many more
documents.question: What has changed on Quickteller?

documents.text: You can expect to make seamless instant payments to over 5,000 billers from different categories, faster transactions, a user-friendly interface and many more.
documents.question: What should I expect on Quickteller?

documents.text: Quickteller is the digital commerce platform that provides access to everyday lifestyle services anytime and anywhere on one app to make you live smarter and stay in control of your finances.
documents.question: What is Quickteller?

documents.text: On Quickteller, you can pay bills, send and receive money, request payments from friends and family, buy airtime and data, take loans etc. Simply put, you can pay for almost anything on Quickteller.
documents.question: What can I do on Quickteller?

documents.text:
Your ecash is now located in your wallet. To view your ecash, sign in Quickteller and navigate to wallet to view your eCash balance.
Is ecash the same as QT account?
No. eCash is a virtual card with limitations while the Quickteller account is a NUBAN standard account (with a 10-digit account number) for receiving funds,sending money and for making payments.
documents.question: I am an existing customer.Why can't I see my ecash on the dashboard?

documents.text: You can't fund your eCash on the new Quickteller.
documents.question: How can I fund my ecash?

documents.text: No, you can only move money from your eCash wallet into your Quckteller account.
documents.question: Can I fund my ecash with QT account?

documents.text: Quickteller is a fully digital platform that allows individuals and businesses to make transactions with ease. With Quickteller, you can get a digital account which is not eCash. The eCash is a virtual card with limitation which can't be used for all transactions.
documents.question: Why can't I see my ecash as a payment option on the payment page?

documents.text: Your ecash is mapped to your account in our system, so we know the transaction is from you.
documents.question: Why don't I need a PIN to move money from my ecash account to my QT account?

documents.text: No you can't because you already have an existing profile. Simply make use of the details used during onboarding to sign in. You can only sign in with google if you used the sign up with google option when creating your account.
documents.question: I am a returning user but I can't sign in with google. What should I do?

documents.text: You can sign up to Quickteller using your phone number, email, google ID, Apple ID on the web, mobile app and USSD on a feature phone. The signup process is quick and intuitive, simply download the mobile app from your play store or visit the web on www.quickteller.com/signup and follow the easy steps, or dial *723# on your smart phone or feature phone. (click here to see how)
documents.question: How do I sign up on the new Quickteller (for new users only)

documents.text:
The Quickteller Wallet system is a digital representation of your physical wallet. It houses your Quickteller Account, your ecash and your bank cards from other banks giving you a single view into all your balances.
How do I move money from my ecash to my QT Account
documents.question: What is the Quickteller Wallet?

documents.text:
Sign in to Quickteller.
Click on wallet and navigate to eCash.
Click on wallet and navigate to eCash.
Click on pay.
Congratulations! you have now moved funds to your QT account.
documents.question: How do I move money from my ecash to my QT Account

documents.text: You can add as many bank cards as you want to your wallet.
documents.question: How many bank cards can I add to my wallet?

documents.text:
It's very easy, simply follow the steps below:
Sign in to your Quickteller account
Click on wallet and navigate to Bank Cards
Click on the bank card to view
Click on check balance and insert CVV and card PIN
Click check balance to view card balance
documents.question: How do I check my card balance

documents.text:
To delete your card from your wallet, follow the steps below:
Sign into the Quickteller platform
Click on wallet and navigate to Bank Cards
Select the card you wish to remove
Click on remove to remove the saved card
documents.question: How can I delete a card from my wallet?

documents.text: Verve cards and Naira MasterCards are currently accepted for all transaction types. VISA cards are also supported for airtime and bill payments on the website.
documents.question: What type of card can I use to make payment on Quickteller?

documents.text: On Quickteller you can pay with your bank cards (Master, Visa, Verve), Pay With Transfer and Pay with your Quickteller account. We are always innovating, so look out for newer ways to pay.
documents.question: What are the Accepted payment instruments on Quickteller

documents.text: On Quickteller you can pay with your bank cards (Master, Visa, Verve), Pay With Transfer and Pay with your Quickteller account. We are always innovating, so look out for newer ways to pay.
